publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2198 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Council Tax (Discount for Unoccupied Dwellings) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Council Tax (Discount for Unoccupied Dwellings) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2198 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Council Tax (Discount for Unoccupied Dwellings) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Council Tax (Discount for Unoccupied Dwellings) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
